The method adopted in Professor Key's Grammar, is that of conjugating the verbs in connexion with some other Latin words, so as to form a short sentence, of which a translation is given. This method is free from all objection : the boy learns the meaning oi the tenses in connexion with other words, and at the same time he begins to get a small vocabulary.
